name: Orchid's Flower Prototype
description:
Orchid's Flower
Play as Orchid, a cyberninja who has been trained to defeat evil. Thanks to her katana she can send projectiles.
Orchid, on her first mission, must protect the city from the robots that attack it.

There are  5 difficulties, for each type of players.

Input
WAST - to move
Left click - attack
Right click - Super attack
SHIFT - Dash
E - Interact
